shortDescription: Genexis PLATINUM 4410 2.1 P4410-V2-1.28 devices allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via shell metacharacters to sys_config_valid.xgi, as demonstrated by the sys_config_valid.xgi?exeshell=%60telnetd%20%26%60 URI.
vulnerabilityName: genexis platinum_4410 Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an OS Command ('OS Command Injection')
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
